member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateAccountBalCheck.PartyA
member.summary: The organization receiving the transaction. This is the party involved in the balance inquiry.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateAccountBalCheck.IdentifierType
member.summary: Type of organization receiving the transaction, represented as an identifier.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateAccountBalCheck.Initiator
member.summary: The name of the initiator who is making the request.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateAccountBalCheck.InitiatorPassword
member.summary: Password for the initiator.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateAccountBalCheck.QueueTimeOutURL
member.summary: The path where information of time-out transactions will be sent. It should contain a valid URI.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateAccountBalCheck.ResultURL
member.summary: The path where the result of the transaction will be sent. It should contain a valid URI.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateAccountBalCheck.Remarks
member.summary: Additional comments that are sent along with the transaction, such as "Account Balance Check".

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateB2B.Initiator
member.summary: The credential/username used to authenticate the transaction request.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateB2B.InitiatorPassword
member.summary: Password for the initiator.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateB2B.Command
member.summary: Unique command for each transaction type. Possible values are: - BusinessPayBill - MerchantToMerchantTransfer - MerchantTransferFromMerchantToWorking - MerchantServicesMMFAccountTransfer - AgencyFloatAdvance

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateB2B.Amount
member.summary: The amount being transacted.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateB2B.PartyA
member.summary: Organization’s short code initiating the transaction.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateB2B.PartyB
member.summary: Organization’s short code receiving the funds being transacted.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateB2B.SenderIdentifier
member.summary: Type of organization sending the transaction.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateB2B.ReceiverIdentifierType
member.summary: Type of organization receiving the funds being transacted.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateB2B.Remarks
member.summary: Comments that are sent along with the transaction.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateB2B.QueueTimeOutURL
member.summary: The path that stores information of timeout transactions. It should be validated to ensure it contains the port, URI, domain name, or a publicly available IP.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateB2B.ResultURL
member.summary: The path that receives results from M-Pesa. It should be validated to ensure it contains the port, URI, domain name, or a publicly available IP.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateB2B.AccountReference
member.summary: Account Reference, mandatory for the “BusinessPayBill” CommandID.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateB2C.InitiatorName
member.summary: The username of the M-Pesa B2C account API operator. NOTE: The access channel for this operator must be API, and the account must be in active status.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateB2C.InitiatorPassword
member.summary: Password for the initiator.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateB2C.Command
member.summary: A unique command that specifies the B2C transaction type. - SalaryPayment: Supports sending money to both registered and unregistered M-Pesa customers. - BusinessPayment: A normal business to customer payment, supports only M-Pesa registered customers. - PromotionPayment: A promotional payment to customers with a congratulatory message. Supports only M-Pesa registered customers.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateB2C.Amount
member.summary: The amount of money being sent to the customer.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateB2C.PartyA
member.summary: The B2C organization shortcode from which the money is to be sent.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateB2C.PartyB
member.summary: The customer mobile number to receive the amount. The number should have the country code (254) without the plus sign.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateB2C.Remarks
member.summary: Any additional information to be associated with the transaction.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateB2C.QueueTimeOutURL
member.summary: URL to be used by the API Proxy to send a notification if the payment request times out while awaiting processing in the queue.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateB2C.ResultURL
member.summary: URL to be used by M-Pesa to send a notification upon processing of the payment request.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateB2C.Occassion
member.summary: Any additional information to be associated with the transaction.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateC2BRegisterUrl.ValidationURL
member.summary: The URL that receives the validation request from the API upon payment submission. This URL is only called if the external validation on the registered shortcode is enabled. (By default, External Validation is disabled.)

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateC2BRegisterUrl.ConfirmationURL
member.summary: The URL that receives the confirmation request from the API upon payment completion.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateC2BRegisterUrl.ResponseType
member.summary: Specifies what happens if the validation URL is not reachable. Allowed values are: - Completed: M-Pesa will automatically complete your transaction. - Cancelled: M-Pesa will automatically cancel the transaction if the validation URL is unreachable.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateC2BRegisterUrl.ShortCode
member.summary: The short code of the organization.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateC2BTransactionSimulation.Amount
member.summary: The amount being transacted. This parameter is expected to be a numeric value.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateC2BTransactionSimulation.MSISDN
member.summary: The phone number initiating the C2B transaction. Should be in the format of the phone number.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateC2BTransactionSimulation.BillRefNumber
member.summary: Used with the CustomerPayBillOnline option only. This is where a customer is expected to enter a unique bill identifier, such as an Account Number.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateC2BTransactionSimulation.ShortCode
member.summary: The Short Code receiving the amount being transacted.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateC2BTransactionSimulation.Command
member.summary: The unique identifier of the transaction type. Possible values are: - CustomerPayBillOnline: Used for Pay Bills shortcodes. - CustomerBuyGoodsOnline: Used for Buy Goods shortcodes.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateTransactionReversal.Initiator
member.summary: The name of the initiator making the reversal request, typically the organization or MSISDN.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateTransactionReversal.InitiatorPassword
member.summary: Password for the initiator.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateTransactionReversal.ReceiverParty
member.summary: The shortcode (6 digits) of the organization receiving the reversed transaction.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateTransactionReversal.RecieverIdentifierType
member.summary: Type of the organization receiving the reversed transaction, represented as an identifier.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateTransactionReversal.TransactionID
member.summary: The transaction ID of the transaction that is being reversed (e.g., LKXXXX1234).

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateTransactionReversal.Amount
member.summary: The amount to reverse from the transaction.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateTransactionReversal.QueueTimeOutURL
member.summary: The URL to notify in case of a time-out during the reversal process. It should contain a valid URI.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateTransactionReversal.ResultURL
member.summary: The URL to receive the result of the transaction reversal. It should contain a valid URI.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateTransactionReversal.Occasion
member.summary: Optional parameter that references a specific occasion, represented as a string with a maximum of 100 characters.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateTransactionReversal.Remarks
member.summary: Additional comments or remarks accompanying the reversal transaction, with a maximum length of 100 characters.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateTransactionStatusCheck.PartyA
member.summary: Organization or MSISDN receiving the transaction.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateTransactionStatusCheck.IdentifierType
member.summary: Type of organization receiving the transaction, represented as an identifier.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateTransactionStatusCheck.Remarks
member.summary: Additional comments that are sent along with the transaction.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateTransactionStatusCheck.Initiator
member.summary: The name of the initiator who is making the request.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateTransactionStatusCheck.InitiatorPassword
member.summary: Password for the initiator.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateTransactionStatusCheck.QueueTimeOutURL
member.summary: The path where information of time-out transactions will be sent. It should contain a valid URI.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateTransactionStatusCheck.ResultURL
member.summary: The path where the result of the transaction will be sent. It should contain a valid URI.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateTransactionStatusCheck.TransactionID
member.summary: The unique transaction ID whose status is being queried.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateTransactionStatusCheck.Occasion
member.summary: Optional parameter that is sent along with the transaction query to reference a specific occasion.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.Responses.ApiErrorResponse.RequestId
member.summary: Unique identifier for the request.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.Responses.ApiErrorResponse.ErrorCode
member.summary: Error code indicating the type of error.

member.name: P:MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.Responses.ApiErrorResponse.ErrorMessage
member.summary: Description of the error that occurred.

member.name: M:MpesaSDK.NET.MpesaClient.B2BAsync(MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateB2B,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: This API enables Business to Business (B2B) transactions between a business and another business. Use of this API requires a valid and verified B2B M-Pesa short code for the business initiating the transaction and the both businesses involved in the transaction.

member.name: M:MpesaSDK.NET.MpesaClient.C2BSimulateTransactionAsync(MpesaSDK.NET.Dtos.InitiateRequests.InitiateC2BTransactionSimulation,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: This API is used to make payment requests from Client to Business (C2B). You can use the sandbox provided test credentials down below to simulates a payment made from the client phone's STK/SIM Toolkit menu, and enables you to receive the payment requests in real time.
